title: Somnium

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on Somnium-PLAZA ISO release: plaza-somnium.iso (6,709,379,072 bytes)
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 6.2 to 4 GB)
  • Installation takes 2-3 minutes (depending on your system)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: 12.5 GB
  • Language can be changed in game settings
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Somnium is an inter-dimensional adventure game with elements of dark humor. On your long and fun journey to the unknown, you will explore colorful and strange worlds, play different kinds of mini-games, solve puzzles, steal girls’ hearts and embark on many different adventures.

Game Features

  • EXPLORE & SOLVE PUZZLES: Explore surreal dimensions, each with different atmospheres and environments. Meet interesting characters. Solve puzzles and mysteries.
  • HAVE A DRAGON & FIGHT: Become a dragon’s best friend and give it any name you want. Set your enemies on fire and fight huge bosses.
  • ROMANCE WITH GIRLS: Steal the hearts of girls from different dimensions and romance with them. But it won’t be as easy as you think!
  • SLAP SHRUMP!: Need more words?
  • PLAY FUN MINI GAMES: Play fun, different types of mini-games scattered throughout the chapters.
  • DEADLY CHALLENGES & IN-GAME ACHIEVEMENTS: Face challenging platforming elements in levels full of traps and dangers. Complete 44 different in-game achievements, each carefully designed, and 7 other Steam-exclusive achievements.
  • SEEK FOR ANSWERS: Collect story pieces throughout your adventure that will take you to different dimensions. Reach the Dark Tower to find the answers you seek.
